subject: Marketing
title: Number Headlines
description: A quick, practical guide to Number Headlines.

hook.text: '7 Ways to Double Your Income' outperforms 'How to Double Your Income' by 36%.

buildup.text: Numbers in headlines set expectations. The brain knows exactly what it's signing up for.

discovery.text: Odd numbers outperform even numbers. Seven outperforms five. Specificity builds credibility.

twist.text: The number itself is a promise of structureâ€”readers trust organized information more.

climax.text: Number headlines work because they reduce uncertainty about what the content contains.

punchline.text: Numbers promise structure. Structure promises value.

quiz.question: Why do number headlines outperform non-number headlines?
options: They set clear expectations and reduce uncertainty
People only click on headlines with numbers
Search engines require numbers in all headlines
